title: Apple Requirements: Verify that users are prompted to allow the initialization of location services when entering an WBC.TV feed for the first time
custom_preconds: Given we have initially installed the application
custom_steps: When we tap on an WBC.TV feed
custom_expected: Then we will be prompted to allow Location Services to be utilized

title: Apple Requirements: Verify that when a full user turns on notifications in settings the user is prompted to enable Push Notifications
custom_preconds: Given the user is a full World Baseball Classic user
custom_steps:
When the user goes into notifications in settings
And turns on notifications
custom_expected: Then we will see that we are prompted to enable Push Notifications

title: Apple Requirements: Verify that the application doesn't crash on startup
custom_preconds:
Given we have installed the application
And we are currently not inside the application
custom_steps: When we tap on the applications launcher icon
custom_expected:
Then the application launches successfully
And the application doesn't crash

title: Apple Requirements: Verify that the application doesn't crash during Navigation
custom_preconds: Given we have launched the application
custom_steps: When we navigate around the application
custom_expected: Then the application doesn't crash

title: Apple Requirements: Verify that the application doesn't have an abundant amount of obvious defects
custom_preconds:
Given we have launched the application
And we have navigated around the application
And we have cross referenced JIRA for the current release
And there are not an abundant amount of defects
custom_expected: Then the application is ready for release

title: Apple Requirements: Verify that the application performs as advertised by the Developer
custom_preconds:
Given that the Developer has stated the application should perform in a certain way
And we have Navigated around the application
custom_expected: Then the application performs in the way that the Developer had stated

title: Apple Requirements: Verify that the application doesn't include undocumented or hidden features inconsistent with the description
custom_preconds:
Given we have installed the application
And we have navigation around the application
And we have read the applications description
custom_expected:
Then the application doesn't include undocumented features not consistent with the description
And the application doesn't include hidden features not consistent with the description

title: Apple Requirements: Verify that the application name and/or description doesn't contain the terms of Beta, Demo, Trial or Test
custom_preconds: Given we have installed the application
custom_expected:
Then the application name doesn't contain the terms of Beta, Demo, Trial, Test
And the applications description doesn't contain the terms of Beta, Demo, Trial, Test

title: Apple Requirements: Verify that the application can run on both iPhone and iPad without any kind of modifications
custom_preconds:
Given we have installed the application on an iPhone
And we have installed the application on an iPad
custom_expected:
Then the application runs successfully on the iPhone
And the application runs successfully on the iPad

title: Apple Requirements: Verify that if the application was designed for an iPhone that it displays at an iPhone resolution or twice that of an iPhone 3GS resolution
custom_preconds:
Given we have an application that is designated for an iPhone
And we have installed this application on an iPad
custom_expected:
Then the application will display utilizing the iPhone resolution
And will show at twice the iPhone 3GS resolution

title: Apple Requirements: Verify that the application doesn't provide trick or fake functionality that it not clearly marked
custom_preconds:
Given we have read the applications description
And we have installed the application
And we have navigated around the application
custom_expected:
Then the application doesn't display any trick functionality
And the application doesn't display any fake functionality

title: Apple Requirements: Verify that if the application is over 50 MB and the user is connected to a Carrier Connection then the user will be prompted about downloading it on a WiFi connection and will not be able to download it via a Carrier Connection
custom_preconds:
Given the application's size is greater then 50 MB
And the user is connected to a Carrier Connection
custom_steps: When the user attempts to download the application
custom_expected:
Then the user is prompted that they must utilize a WiFi connection to download the application
And the user will not be allowed to download it via the Carrier Connection

title: Apple Requirements: Verify that multitasking applications may only use background services for their intended purposes: VoIP, Audio Playback, Location, Task Completion & Local Notifications among others
custom_preconds:
Given we have a multitasking application
And we have navigated around the application
custom_expected: Then the background services utilized are utilized only for their intended purposes: VoIP, Audio Playback, Location, Task Completion, Local Notifications among others

title: Apple Requirements: Verify that the application doesn't provide an incorrect diagnostic or other inaccurate device data
custom_preconds:
Given we have installed the application
And we have navigated around the application
custom_expected:
Then the application doesn't provide incorrect diagnostic data
And the application doesn't provide incorrect device data

title: Apple Requirements: Verify that all images inside of the application support both Retina and non-Retina displays
custom_preconds:
Given we have installed the application
And we have navigated around the application
custom_expected:
Then the images inside of the application support Retina displays
And the images inside of the application support non-Retina displays

title: Apple Requirements: Verify that the application icon size for the application inside of the Apple AppStore is the same size as all the other icons in the Apple AppStore
custom_preconds:
Given we have opened up the Apple AppStore
And we have navigated to our application
And we have navigated to other applications
custom_expected: Then the application icon size for the application matches up with all the other application icon sizes that display inside of the Apple AppStore

title: Apple Requirements: Verify that the Audio-Only Slate will appear inside of the Media Player if there is limited connectivity during Video Playback
custom_preconds:
Given we have installed the application
And we have started up the Media Player
And there is limited connectivity
custom_expected:
Then an Audio-Only slate will appear to the user while they have limited connectivity
And will disappear when the users connection improves

title: Upgrade from a previous version
custom_preconds:
Given you have the Release version A installed
And login into an WorldBaseballClassic.com account
custom_steps: When you install Release version B
custom_expected:
Then you will not be prompted with the PayWall
And your WorldBaseballClassic.com account credentials will be saved

title: iPhone iOS 5.x and above - Mirroring
custom_preconds:
Given you are using an iPhone that is iOS 5.x or above
And are on the same network as the Apple TV
custom_steps:
When you double tap on the iPhone physical Home button
And swipe to the left twice to reveal the volume and AirPlay controls
custom_expected:
Then tapping on the AirPlay button
And selecting Apple TV
And switching Mirroring to "ON" displays the iPhone image and World Baseball Classic app on the phone

title: iPhone iOS 5.x and above - Highlights
custom_preconds:
Given you are using an iPhone that is iOS 5.x or above
And are on the same network as the Apple TV
custom_steps: When you play a Video Highlight from the Video & Gameday section in the app
custom_expected: Then the video highlight is played through AirPlay on a TV

title: iPhone iOS 5.x and above - WBC.TV
custom_preconds:
Given you are using an iPhone that is iOS 5.x or above
And are on the same network as the Apple TV
custom_steps: When you play an WBC.TV feed
custom_expected: Then the WBC.TV feed will be played through AirPlay on a TV

title: iPad iOS 5.x and above - Mirroring
custom_preconds:
Given you are using an iPad that is iOS 5.x or above
And are on the same network as the Apple TV
custom_steps:
When you double tap on the iPad physical Home button
And swipe to the left twice to reveal the volume and AirPlay controls
custom_expected:
Then tapping on the AirPlay button
And selecting Apple TV
And switching Mirroring to "ON" displays the iPad image and World Baseball Classic app on the phone

title: iPad iOS 5.x and above - Highlights
custom_preconds:
Given you are using an iPad that is iOS 5.x or above
And are on the same network as the Apple TV
custom_steps: When you play a Video Highlight from Gameday
custom_expected: Then the video highlight is played through AirPlay on a TV

title: iPad iOS 5.x and above - WBC.TV
custom_preconds:
Given you are using an iPhone that is iOS 5.x or above
And are on the same network as the Apple TV
custom_steps: When you play an WBC.TV feed
custom_expected: Then the WBC.TV feed will be played through AirPlay on a TV
